game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the hidden treasure in the abandoned temple
game.description: In a remote jungle, there is an abandoned temple said to hold a legendary treasure. Many adventurers have tried to find it, but none have succeeded. Can you be the one to uncover the secrets of the lost treasure?

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the temple
task.description: According to the old map, the entrance to the temple should be hidden behind a waterfall. Find the waterfall and search for any indications of a hidden entrance.

task.objective: Retrieve the key to the temple
task.description: The temple is locked and requires a special key to enter. The key is rumored to be guarded by a tribe of native warriors. Make contact with the tribe and obtain the key through negotiation or whatever means necessary.
The temple is booby-trapped with various mechanisms designed to deter intruders. Carefully navigate through the traps and solve puzzles to progress deeper into the temple.
The treasure chamber is said to be hidden deep within the temple. Search every corner and solve the final puzzle to unveil the legendary treasure.
